snippet: Some advocates had hoped Britain would respond more harshly to China’s move to restrict democracy in the city.
abstract: British government's statement in support of China's strict limits on how Hong Kong selects its next leader is a blow for democracy advocates, who have called for open election for city's leader.
lead_paragraph: Some advocates had hoped Britain would respond more harshly to China’s move to restrict democracy in the city.

headline.main: British Response to Election Limits Upsets Activists in Hong Kong
headline.print_headline: Hong Kong: British Stance on Elections Disappoints Pro-Democracy Activists
